Viral pneumonia/pneumonitis?--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
Viral pneumonia/pneumonitis?--- Vital status at discharge::;;;
Vital status at discharge:--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
Vital status at discharge:--- Runny nose (Rhinorrhea) ?.1:;;;
Vital status:--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
Weight in kg:--- Cough ?.1:;;;
Weight in kg:--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?--- Cardiac arrest?:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?--- Electronic cigarettes?:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?--- Extremity weakness or numbness ?.1:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?--- Psychiatric disease?:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?.1--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?.1--- Other chronic lung disease ? :;;;
